segments.text: My eyes keep going back to those kids, they're up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically standing on his tiptoes on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could topple over at any second; those legs are really splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching so far into the cookie jar, almost falling in himself!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the "COOKIE JAR" label quite clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, hand outstretched, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're clearly in cahoots, secretly raiding the stash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me a little angry that they're being so sneaky, but also a bit amused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is definitely a classic childhood caper.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the crash if that stool goes down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the woman's shout when she finally realizes what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're enjoying their forbidden treat, for now.
segments.speaker: PAR
